products.title: Swarovski Octea Lux Crystal Watch
products.description: Bizim ən çox satılan 'Octea' saat kolleksiyamızın yeni dəbdəbəli xronoqraf saatı ilə yeni dəqiqlik və sənətkarlıq səviyyəsinə çatır. Gündəlik istifadə üçün idealdır, yığılmış və interval vaxtı ilə saniyəölçən funksiyasına malikdir. Korpus çəhrayı qızılı ilə örtülmüş paslanmayan poladdan hazırlanmışdır, Swarovski saatlarına xas olan üzlü kristal bezel, günəş şüaları ilə işləyən siferblat və timsah effektli həqiqi dəri kəmər zümrüd yaşıl tonları ilə parlayır.

Hamilton Men's Khaki King Series Stainless Steel Automatic Watch with Brown Leather Band
products.description: Stainless steel watch featuring round black dial with day/date display at 12 o'clock, sword-shape hands, and 24-hour time on inner dial 40 mm stainless steel case with anti-reflective sapphire dial window Automatic self-wind movement with analog display Leather band with contrast stitching and buckle closure Water resistant to 50 m (165 ft): In general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling

products.title: Gucci Dive Analog Display Swiss Quartz Silver-Tone Men's Watch

products.title: Gucci G-Timeless Contemporary Bee Watch
products.description: Green and Red Web Nylon (Bee Embroidered) dial. Yellow Gold PVD stainless steel case with a white (calfskin) leather band. Quartz movement. 50 meters / 165 feet water resistance. Fixed bezel. Tang clasp. Case size 38 mm. Gucci YA1264128 G-Timeless Watch.

products.title: Tommy Hilfiger Women's Quartz Stainless Steel and Mesh Bracelet Casual Watch, Color: Carnation
products.description: MODERN DESIGN: A casual watch with minimalistic attributes and versatile in wear. This collection features a thinner case that sits well on the wrist. Women's 40 mm carnation gold case and mesh bracelet with a silver white dial. Quartz movement provides precise timekeeping and minimal maintenance for a reliable and worry-free timepiece. Made from glass and protects watch from scratches. Your Tommy Hilfiger watch has been developed with meticulous attention to quality, function and detail. A maintenance interval of 3 to 5 years is recommended, in addition to any required battery replacement. Never open the watch yourself.

products.title: Oris Williams Mechanical (Automatic) Black Dial Mens Watch
products.description: This watch is Certified Pre-Owned in New or Like New condition. Watch may show subtle scratches. The case should exhibit no dents or dings and the bracelet should show little wear or stretch. The watch keeps time according to manufacturer’s specification and needs no mechanical service.

products.title: TAG Heuer Men's 'Monaco' Swiss Automatic Stainless Steel and Leather Dress Watch
products.description: Stainless steel case with a black leather strap. Fixed bezel. 'denim' blue dial with red hands and index hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Date display at the 6 o'clock position. Chronograph - sub-dials displaying: two - 60 second and 30 minute. Automatic movement. Caliber 11 engine. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Swiss-automatic Movement. Case Diameter: 39mm. Water resistant to 100m (330ft): in general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not diving

products.title: Michael Kors Men's Slim Runway Stainless Steel Quartz Watch
products.description: From jet setting adventures to the 9 to 5 grind, the iconic Slim Runway watch collection by Michael Kors provide luxurious style with a modern splash of trend-right touches. Featuring a 44mm case, 22mm band width, scratch-resistant mineral crystal glass, Quartz movement with 3-hand analog display, imported. Round stainless steel case with a black dial. Red aluminium bracelet with deployant closure. Michael Kors is a world-renowned, award-winning designer of luxury accessories and ready-to-wear with an innate sense of glamour and an unfailing eye for timeless chic.

products.title: Michael Kors Women's Lady Nini Chain Watch, 3 Hand Quartz Movement with Crystal Bezel
products.description: Featuring a 35mm case, 18mm band width, scratch-resistant mineral crystal glass, Quartz movement with 3-hand analog display, imported. Round stainless steel case with a gold dial. gold stainless steel bracelet with deployant closure. Water resistant to 50m (165ft): in general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling

products.title: Cartier Women's W6701004 'Ronde Solo' Stainless Steel Watch with Link Bracelet
products.description: Round stainless steel watch featuring blue baton hands and Roman numeral hour markers on silver logoed dial. Quartz movement with analog display. Mineral crystal dial window. Features deployment-clasp closure on stainless steel link bracelet. Water-resistant to 30 m (99 ft): withstands rain and splashes of water, but not showering or submersion.
